caption.p: Effect of NLRC5 KD on differentially expressed immune genes during H5N2 infection. NLRC5 siRNA and scramble control transfected MQ-NCSU cells were infected with H5N2 virus. Total RNA was collected at 24 hpi and assayed by the RT 2 Profiler PCR Array system. Selected genes taking part in innate and adaptive immune response are shown as log 2 transform of fold-change expression relative to the gene expression in the mock-transfected cells. Data represent an average of three biological replicates.
